function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Limited literature and research on the relationship between green trust and satisfaction, which may impact the understanding of consumer behavior towards eco-friendly products.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of disposable face masks contributing to environmental pollution and waste.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Environmental pollutants play a significant role in the spread of covid-19","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of adoption of environmentally friendly business practices","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Failure to incorporate green marketing in all activities of the firms","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Shortage of goods in grocery retail stores","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Encouraging new behaviors through government policies","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increase in online retailing due to social distancing measures and fear of infection","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of contagious diseases through touch-based technology, such as self-checkout counters","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependence on frontline retail employees","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Slow adoption of self-checkout technology","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of long-term human resource strategies","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased exposure to contagious diseases due to working with larger crowds and handling returned items.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Verbal abuse and threats from frustrated customers due to new safety measures and restrictions.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Perception of low social status and lack of glamour in retail work, exacerbated by pandemic-related challenges.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Crowding in supermarkets leading to increased risk of contagious disease transmission","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Low wages leading to irregular working hours and minimal qualifications","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased reliance on local suppliers may lead to a decrease in the quality of products","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Decrease in the value of transactions with existing suppliers due to diversification","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Shift towards online shopping highlights the need for strong customer service and online presence","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of strong relationships with suppliers","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Dependence on single suppliers","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of agility in supply chain","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Retailers sourcing from a wider geographic region may increase the risk of spreading contagious diseases through the distribution chain.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Operating 24/7 and providing retail services whenever and wherever the consumer demands may increase the risk of transmission of contagious diseases due to higher foot traffic and frequent interactions.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate replenishment of goods during the pandemic resulted in consumers quickly switching to other retailers, potentially increasing the spread of contagious diseases as people move between different stores and locations.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Panic buying due to the increase in covid-19 cases","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exacerbation of disruptions due to government measures like social distancing","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Adoption of technologies and online shopping due to evolving pandemic situation","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of social distancing in the hospitality industry","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased workload in supermarkets","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased risk of virus transmission due to long queues and crowded stores","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Emotional stress and strain on retail employees","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Abandoned grocery baskets leading to additional work for retail employees","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased demand for online retail operations","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Shift towards online shopping and cashless transactions","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Primary agricultural producers unable to sell produce due to movement control orders and travel restrictions.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Surge in demand for online grocery shopping leading to unprepared online retailers and insufficient delivery capacity.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Disruption in the supply chain due to pandemic-related measures","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Global panic buying, food protectionism, and lockdowns","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependence on neighboring countries for food supply","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of social distancing measures in smaller retailers leading to higher risk of infection","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited access to essential goods for vulnerable populations","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Strain on the profitability of smaller retailers","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Panic buying leading to long queues and abandoned groceries","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High demand for groceries leading to crowded supermarkets","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Elderly shoppers still going to crowded places","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Panic buying leading to shortage of essential goods","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Social media exacerbating panic buying","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Bottleneck in distribution channel due to surge in demand","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"}]}
